DOC.brief_summary: To verify if the screening opportunistic of Atrial Fibrillation (AF) by means of the measurement of the arterial peripheral pulse is more effective than the habitual practice for the early detection of AF in 65-year-old who come to Primary care
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness of Early Detection of Atrial Fibrillation
DOC.criteria: Patients that come to his center of health for any motive. That give his assent informed to take part in the study. FA previous Diagnosis
